before gap p2tog p1 turn work repeat row 5 and 6 until all stitches are worked on the last two row you work you will end with one row with ssk and one row with p2tog you will have 18 20 stitches on needle 1 treasured toes simple ribbed sock directions continued gussets  kni t across 18 20 stitches on needle 1 pick up and knit 16 18 stitches along side of the heel flap one stitch for each slipped stitch you now have 34 38 stitches on needle 1  combine held stitches from needles 2 and 3 onto needle 2 you now have 32 36 stitches on needle 2  make 1 stitch then knit across stitches on needle 2 you now have 33 37 stitches on needle 2  using needle 3 pick up and knit 16 18 stitches along other side of the heel flap one stitch for each slipped stitch continuing with needle 3 knit 9 10 stitches from needle 1  slip remaining 9 10 stitches from heel flap onto what is now needle 1 you should now have stitches arranged as follows  needle 1 25 28 stitches half of the bottom of the
